definition.name: Pagination
definition.purpose: Provides a navigation container for pagination controls.
definition.description: A navigation component that wraps pagination controls, setting appropriate ARIA roles and classes for accessibility and layout.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the navigation element.

initial.data: No pagination controls rendered by default; only the navigation container.

visible: Empty navigation container with pagination role

when.description: Pagination controls are added as children.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the navigation container

effects: Pagination controls become accessible via navigation landmarks

definition.visualLayout: A flex container centered horizontally, intended to contain pagination controls.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses React.ComponentProps<'nav'> for props and merges className with utility function.

definition.name: PaginationContent
definition.purpose: Wraps pagination items in a list for layout and accessibility.
definition.description: A component that renders a <ul> element for pagination items, applying layout and accessibility attributes.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the list element.

when.description: Pagination items are added as children.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the list

effects: Pagination items are displayed in a row

definition.visualLayout: A flex row list for pagination items.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses React.ComponentProps<'ul'> for props and merges className with utility function.

definition.name: PaginationItem
definition.purpose: Represents a single pagination item within the pagination list.
definition.description: A component that renders a <li> element for a pagination item, applying a data attribute for slot targeting.

when.description: Pagination link or control is rendered as a child.
when.event: Child is rendered inside the list item

effects: Pagination control is grouped in the list

definition.visualLayout: A list item for pagination controls.

definition.name: PaginationLink
definition.purpose: Renders a pagination link styled as a button, with active state support.
definition.description: A component that renders an anchor tag styled as a button for pagination, supporting active state and size props.

isActive.description: Whether the link represents the current page.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the anchor element.

visible: Anchor element styled as a button

effects: ARIA current attribute is set to 'page'

definition.visualLayout: An anchor styled as a button, with optional active state.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses buttonVariants for styling and cn for class merging. Accepts all anchor props.

definition.name: PaginationPrevious
definition.purpose: Renders a pagination link for navigating to the previous page.
definition.description: A component that renders a styled pagination link with a left chevron icon and 'Previous' label, intended for navigating to the previous page.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the link.

visible: Pagination link with left chevron and 'Previous' label

effects: Triggers navigation to the previous page

definition.visualLayout: A button-like link with a left chevron and 'Previous' label.
definition.implementationNotes: Composes PaginationLink and injects icon and label. Uses cn for class merging.

definition.name: PaginationNext
definition.purpose: Renders a pagination link for navigating to the next page.
definition.description: A component that renders a styled pagination link with a right chevron icon and 'Next' label, intended for navigating to the next page.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the link.

visible: Pagination link with right chevron and 'Next' label

effects: Triggers navigation to the next page

definition.visualLayout: A button-like link with a right chevron and 'Next' label.
definition.implementationNotes: Composes PaginationLink and injects icon and label. Uses cn for class merging.

definition.name: PaginationEllipsis
definition.purpose: Renders an ellipsis indicator for skipped pagination pages.
definition.description: A component that renders a span with an ellipsis icon, used to indicate skipped pages in pagination controls.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the span.

visible: Span with ellipsis icon and screen-reader text

effects: Indicates that some pages are not shown

definition.visualLayout: A span with a centered ellipsis icon.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses MoreHorizontalIcon and screen-reader text for accessibility.
